name: Battle Wizards (Holo Games)
description:
Battle Wizards is an online multiplayer platformer with simple but fun gameplay. Battle with a range of different spells and create custom maps to play on with your friends. This game supports cross platform between mobile and pc.

GO TO DISCORD TO FIND OPEN ROOMS

https://discord.gg/wu8RTCrzwr

If you go the game on the release day and you couldn't access the discord you should be able to do it now. Sorry for the inconvenience. 

Controls PC:

Arrows to move and space to cast spells.
